analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0xb3b31a7cdd980375b30e1c9d11be918cb74e770c.sol:
	Contract ROA has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0xb3b31a7cdd980375b30e1c9d11be918cb74e770c.sol#289)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0xb3b31a7cdd980375b30e1c9d11be918cb74e770c.sol:
